snippet.title: Songs for a Hero - Definitive Edition
snippet.description:
The Definitive Edition is out now!
📌store.steampowered.com/app/389170/


DLC - Songs for the Dead! - A spooky chapter for "Songs for a Hero". Fight your way through 3 levels with haunted mansions and crypts full of dark creatures that might as well have come straight from a horror movie. A brand-new campaign with plenty of heavy metal and rock'n'roll!



DLC - Songs for a Hero: Epilogue! - A campaign that takes place right after the Hero's last mission in Songs for a Hero.



DLC - Samba for a Hero! - Nothing better than taking a vacation after tons of adventures, am I right? A new level inspired by the Brazilian Samba and Carnival!


Plus 2 Skin Packs! - With 20+ skins to play with!
The game that sings all your actions just got Definitive!

If you want to give us feedback, need support or want to report a bug, we are fulltime on our Discord Channel:
discord.gg/KfDBYWZ


Developed by Dumativa & Castro Brothers
